name: PushCat (itch) (Stefan Wacker)
description:
PushCat is my first tiny game I made with Game Maker Studio 2 back in 2018.

It´s a fun game about a cat pushing crates to escape the animal catcher.
12 levels that should give you about
10 – 20 minutes of headaches ;)

It's free.
You like it?
Buy me a coffee or a new laptop :)

Hope you guys like it!
Let me know what you think in the comments.
